Class Utilities

    spMonitor - Utilities Utilities used by SplashActivity and/or spMonitor
    Version:
    0.2 beta August 19, 2015.
    Author:
    Bernd Giesecke

    • Method Detail

      • checkDeviceIP

        public static java.lang.String checkDeviceIP(java.lang.String ip)
        Sends a HTTP request to an IP to test if it is the spMonitor
        Parameters:
        ip - IP address to test
        Returns:
        resultToDisplay HTTP response from the IP

      • fillSeries

        public static void fillSeries(android.database.Cursor data)
        Load plot series with data received from database
        Parameters:
        data - database cursor with recorded values each cursor entry has 8 values cursor[0] = year stamp cursor[1] = month stamp cursor[2] = day stamp cursor[3] = hour stamp cursor[4] = minute stamp cursor[5] = sensor power cursor[6] = consumed power cursor[7] = light value

      • getCurrentDate

        public static int[] getCurrentDate()
        Get current date as integer
        Returns:
        int[] Date as integer values int[0] = year int[1] = month int[2] = day

      • getCurrentTime

        public static java.lang.String getCurrentTime()
        Get current time as string
        Returns:
        String Time as string HH:mm

      • isJSONValid

        public static boolean isJSONValid(java.lang.String test)
        Check if JSON object is valid
        Parameters:
        test - String with JSON object or array
        Returns:
        boolean true if "test" us a JSON object or array false if no JSON object or array

      • scanSubNet

        private static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> scanSubNet(java.lang.String subnet)
        Scan the local subnet and return a list of IP addresses found
        Parameters:
        subnet - Base IP address of the subnet
        Returns:
        hosts Array list with all found IP addresses

      • searchDeviceIP

        public static java.lang.String searchDeviceIP()
        Customized alert
        Returns:
        deviceIPcontext URL address of the spMonitor device
